faqPage.title: FAQ
faqPage.a1: FOMO is a decentralized platform that enables domain name owners to tokenize their domains. Domain owners can verify ownership via DNS records and create tradeable tokens backed by their domain assets on Base Chain.
faqPage.q2: How do I create a domain token?
faqPage.a2:
1. Connect your wallet
2. Enter your domain name (e.g., example.com)
3. Add a DNS TXT record to verify ownership
4. Click "Verify" to confirm ownership
5. Set the initial buy amount (optional)
6. Click "Create Token" to deploy your token
faqPage.a3: The bonding curve is a mathematical pricing mechanism that automatically adjusts token prices based on supply. When more tokens are bought, the price increases. When tokens are sold, the price decreases. This ensures fair price discovery without relying on centralized market makers.
faqPage.a4: When a token's bonding curve reaches its graduation threshold (approximately 800M tokens sold), the token "graduates" and liquidity is automatically migrated to Uniswap V4. After graduation, the token trades on Uniswap with standard AMM mechanics.
faqPage.q5: How do I buy or sell tokens?
faqPage.a5:
1. Click on any token to view its trading page
2. Select the "Buy" or "Sell" tab
3. Enter the amount of ETH to spend or tokens to sell
4. Review the transaction details including price impact
5. Click "Confirm" and approve the transaction in your wallet
faqPage.a6:
• Trading Fee: 1% on each buy/sell transaction
• Gas Fee: Standard Base network gas fees
• Creation Fee: Small one-time fee to deploy your token

Fees help maintain the platform and provide liquidity incentives.
faqPage.a7: Yes, your domain remains under your control. FOMO only verifies ownership via DNS records - we never have access to your domain registrar or DNS management. The tokenization is purely financial and does not affect your domain ownership.
faqPage.a8:
FOMO supports all major wallets including:
• MetaMask
• Coinbase Wallet
• WalletConnect compatible wallets
• Rainbow
• And more

Make sure your wallet is connected to Base network.
faqPage.contact: Need more help? Contact us on Twitter @FOMOplatform

hero.title: Send Crypto to Domains
hero.subtitle: The first wallet that lets you transfer cryptocurrency directly to domain names. No more copying long addresses - just type the domain.

features.title: Why Namespace Wallet?
features.subtitle: Built for the future of Web3 payments. Secure, intuitive, and powered by DomainFi.

domainAddress.title: Domain as Address
domainAddress.desc: Send crypto to any verified domain. No more copying and pasting complex addresses. Just type spotify.com and send.

transferGuard.title: Transfer Guard
transferGuard.desc: Every transfer is protected. We verify the domain ownership before allowing any transaction to proceed.

doubleVerify.title: Double Verification
doubleVerify.desc: We check both the on-chain registry and real-time DNS records. If they don't match, the transfer is blocked.

phishing.title: Phishing Protection
phishing.desc: Built-in detection for homoglyph attacks and typosquatting. We warn you about suspicious domain names.

firstTransfer.title: First Transfer Alerts
firstTransfer.desc: Get extra confirmation when sending to a domain for the first time. Prevent accidental transfers to wrong addresses.

multiChain.title: Multi-chain Ready
multiChain.desc: Currently supporting Base network with more chains coming soon. One domain, multiple chains.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to send crypto to any domain

step1.title: Enter Domain
step1.desc: Type the domain name you want to send to, like spotify.com or your friend's personal domain.

step2.title: Verify & Confirm
step2.desc: We automatically verify the domain ownership and show you the resolved address. Review and confirm.

step3.title: Send Securely
step3.desc: Your transaction is processed with double verification. Funds arrive safely at the verified address.

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.description: We implement multiple layers of security to protect your assets. Our double verification system ensures that DNS hijacking attacks cannot compromise your transfers.
security.item1: Real-time DNS verification before every transfer
security.item2: On-chain registry validation through smart contracts
security.item3: Automatic blocking when addresses don't match

demo.mismatchWarning: Address mismatch detected! The DNS record does not match the contract registry.
demo.caption: Transfers are automatically blocked when verification fails

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Download Namespace Wallet and experience the future of crypto payments. Send to domains, not addresses.
